reference.title: (ApacheMonitor) Apache HTTP Server
reference.shortdesc: The ZenPacks.zenoss.ApacheMonitor ZenPack monitors Apache HTTP Server by collecting metrics through the mod_status module.

section.p: The following metrics are collected and graphed for Apache HTTP Server.

li.p: CPU Utilization of the HTTP server and all worker processes or threads
Slot Usage (Open, Waiting, Reading Request, Sending Reply, Keep-Alive DNS Lookup, and Logging)
